Detailed Description

Basic error handler that prints to cerr and dies by either throwing an exception or calling abort().

Definition at line 58 of file VerboseErrHandler.h.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void VerboseErrHandler::handleError ( const std::string &  msg  )  [inline, virtual]

When something terminal happens this function is called.

This is the place to do any last minute cleanup, log writing, and communication with the user about what went wrong. The implementation of this function should either exit the program or throw an exception.

Parameters:
msg - Message about what went wrong.

Implements ErrHandler.
